heading: Eldewrito 0.4.11 Released
body:
The team is proud to announce version 0.4.11 has been released. This release has a host of bug fixes and new features including Sprint Fixes. Be sure to check out the Halo Click Release Notes thread for more in-depth information.

Please be sure to run the Launcher to update the version.

- Eldewrito Team
author: DARKC0DE
